content.en_us:
A type of ore, found especially common in [[schist layers|Graphitic Schist]]. Can be shredded into powder to be used for making [[desh|Desh]], or hammered into fragments using an [[anvil|Anvil]] to be shredded and then smelted.

Contains:
[[Boron]]
[[Lanthanium]]
[[Cobalt]]
[[Cerium]]
[[Neodymium]]
[[Niobium]]

Also yields [[zirconium|Zirconium]] when [[centrifuged|Centrifuge]].
content.zh_cn:
一大类矿物，主要存在于[[页岩地层|Graphitic Schist]]中。
可粉碎为用于制作[[Desh]]的粉末，
也可在[[砧|Anvil]]中砸成碎片后再进一步粉碎和烧炼。

含有：
[[硼|Boron]][[镧|Lanthanium]][[钴|Cobalt]][[铈|Cerium]][[钕|Neodymium]][[铌|Niobium]]

使用[[离心机|Centrifuge]]处理时，
还可获取[[锆|Zirconium]]。
